title: Careers in electronic engineering
brief_description: A vocational guide to radio, television and electronics. Opens with a discussion on the relative merits of training programs offered by American trade schools, technical institutes, and universities. Explains how the training in electronic theory and practice gained at a technical institute is specially suited for students planning a career in radio, television or electronic engineering. The film shows various aspects of training at the Valparaiso TEchnical Insitute and shows the opportunities which exist for graduates in television, radio, police radio, aviation, marine radio, and electronic engineering.
